refsect1.title: Summary
refsect1.para: The show operator returns an array's schema. This is useful if you are changing array dimensions with nested statements. The argument named_array must be an array that was previously created and stored in the SciDB namespace.

informalexample.para: Show the schema that results from several nested operations:store(subarray(build( <val:double>[i=0:2,3,0,j=0:3,4,0,k=0:4,5,0], j+k),1,1,2,2,3,3),output_array); show(output_array);The schema of output_array is:[("output_array<val:double> [i=0:1,3,0,j=0:2,4,0,k=0:1,5,0]")]
